Body: building a product utilizing EWM3166 module used in Azure IoT devkit and would like to customize the bootloader. where can I find the source code for Azure IoT devkit AZ3166 bootloader?
The EWM3166 bootloader is proprietary code from MXChip. So it's necessary to contact with them in order to get it.

What bootloader?   The devkit seems to have an on-board ST-LINK.  The STM32F4 inside the module will have an immutable, closed source ROM bootloader but it's not clear that would be in use.  If there's a custom bootloader in flash you'd first need to identify it.  Generally questions seeking to find an off-site resource aren't a fit here.   As a piece of advice, you *definitely* want to bring out the SWD pins to where you can connect an ST-LINK with a header and also spring pins for production, and you probably want a UART, too, *even* if your product is intended to be USB.
